name: Daniel Littlehorn

topics.response_text: Well, hello there. I assume that you've come about the contract that we're offering.

topics.topic_text: Remind me what this deal is, again.
topics.response_text: The deal is this: you are now in the employ of Littlehorn and Associates. We deal in all many of affairs, most of which are not your concern.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, I'm here about the deal.
topics.response_text: Good, good. Direct. To the point. I like that in an employee. Then you understand what your purpose is.

topics.topic_text: Body parts for money. I like that. Now pay me.
topics.response_text: Oh, how we do love enthusiasm in our employees. The deal is quite simple, as you know.
This is the current home office of Littlehorn and Associates. This is where we operate our little business.
Now, that's the sort of question which will endanger our relationship.
They are fellow associates such as yourself. They simply possess a different set of skills than you.
I am Daniel Littlehorn. I offer you the currency that you crave in exchange for services aligned to your skills.

topics.topic_text: I have ears to sell you.
topics.response_text: Excellent. I had suspected that's why you came to me.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I don't have any right now.
topics.response_text: I would scold you for wasting our time, but I enjoy a practical joke.

topics.topic_text: Actually, never mind. I'll hang on to them.
topics.response_text: You'll be back. They always come back.
So, the deal is this: there are a lot of evil assholes out there. Take 'em down, bring us their fingers as proof and we'll pay you for each.

combat.topic_text: I don't care about your cause. I'm here for the money.
combat.response_text: Fair enough. We'll still take the help where we can get it.

combat.topic_text: What are the Regulators all about?
combat.response_text: We live to cleanse the Wasteland of the scum and evil that pollute it. We're the only thing that represents any sort of law out here.

description:
Daniel Littlehorn is a 75 year-old Caucasian Male.

A weathered figure in his late seventies, Daniel Littlehorn is the enigmatic leader of Littlehorn & Associates, a clandestine organization operating in the Capitol Wasteland. Despite his advanced age, he maintains a sharp mind and a calculating demeanor, presiding over his organization from the relative safety of his scrapyard office. Littlehorn's organization is known for its morally reprehensible activities, including eliminating perceived threats, contaminating vital water sources, and sabotaging altruistic endeavors. He maintains an air of sophistication that masks the ruthless nature of his operations.

Daniel Littlehorn's Personality: Daniel Littlehorn is a calculating and manipulative individual who presents himself as a refined gentleman but harbors a deep-seated cynicism toward humanity. He values efficiency and results above all else, viewing morality as a hindrance rather than a virtue. Despite his age, he remains sharp-witted and observant, always several steps ahead of his adversaries. He speaks with measured precision, choosing his words carefully to maintain an aura of control and authority.

Daniel Littlehorn's Backstory: Born before the Great War, Daniel Littlehorn witnessed the collapse of civilization firsthand. These experiences forged his worldview, leading him to believe that altruism and cooperation were merely temporary illusions before inevitable self-destruction. After the war, he founded Littlehorn & Associates, an organization dedicated to what he calls 'pragmatic solutions' to the wasteland's problemsâ€”solutions that often involve eliminating the competition and controlling resources through fear and manipulation. Over the decades, he has built a network of informants and operatives across the Capitol Wasteland, all while maintaining his base of operations in a fortified scrapyard office.
